context_bundle.summary: File-based command protocol for agent coordination. DC drops JSON command files, daemon processes them. Includes command structure, response handling, and timeout patterns.

onboarding.quick_start: Command structure: {id, action, params, timestamp}. Save to C:\PhiDEX\commands\daemon\cmd_{guid}.json. Daemon watches folder, executes, writes response to C:\PhiDEX\responses\res_{id}.json.
common_patterns: Command file: cmd_{id}.json with action + params
Response file: res_{id}.json with status + result
Timeout: Poll for response file up to N seconds

known_errors.cause: Daemon not running or file watcher failed
known_errors.solution: Check daemon process, verify FileSystemWatcher enabled
